-- | test suite for testing HDBI
--   
--   The set of database-independent tests for testing the common interface
--   implementation by drivers.
@package hdbi-tests
@version 1.1.1

module Database.HDBI.Tests

-- | Database specific type names for each SqlValue type
data TestFieldTypes
TestFieldTypes :: Query -> Query -> Query -> Query -> Query -> Query -> Query -> Query -> Query -> Query -> Query -> Query -> TestFieldTypes
tfDecimal :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfInteger :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfDouble :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfText :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfBlob :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfBool :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfBitField :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfUUID :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfUTCTime :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfLocalDate :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfLocalTimeOfDay :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
tfLocalTime :: TestFieldTypes -> Query
allTests :: Connection con => TestFieldTypes -> con -> Test
instance Arbitrary UUID
instance Arbitrary (DecimalRaw Integer)
instance (ToSql a, FromSql a, ToSql b, FromSql b, ToSql c, FromSql c) => SqlRow (a, b, c)
instance (ToSql a, FromSql a, ToSql b, FromSql b) => SqlRow (a, b)
